page.title: 07GLENN'S SCHOOLDAY (MORNING)
page.content: {GLENN'S DAY}I woke up at 7:15 and listened to the radio.I went into the bathroom and had a wash then I went downstairs and had my breakfast,we had cornflakes for breakfast. I played on my computer.When it was time for school I cleaned my teeth,got my coat on and went on my way.As soon as I got to school I played football on the playground until it was time to go in. I went into the cloak_room and changed my shoes,then went into our classroom where I read for 10 minutes then I got on with my project work.My teacher called the register,then allowed me to get on with some work.At 10:10 we had assembly until 10:30.At 10:30 we had playtime,It was raining so we stayed inside and played chess.After playtime we had maths until dinnertime.At dinnertime I went home. { (CONTINUED page 8)
